scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint John the Evangelist, identifiable by his halo and golden eagle attribute, seated outdoors in a rocky, verdant landscape. He is dressed in a blue robe and a red cloak, and is shown writing on a scroll. To his left, a golden eagle stands, looking towards the scroll. In the background, a stylized landscape with blue hills and distant towers is visible under a sky with golden rays descending from clouds. The scene is framed by an illuminated border with foliate motifs.
